Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

item.name: Classic Burger
item.description: Our classic burger is made with a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce.

item.name: Cheese Burger
item.description: Our cheese burger is made with a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese.

item.name: Super Burger
item.description: Our Super burger is made with two juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce.

item.name: Veggie Burger
item.description: Our veggie burger is made with a grilled vegetable patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce.

item.name: Chicken Burger
item.description: Our chicken burger is made with a grilled chicken patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce.

item.name: Fish Burger
item.description: Our fish burger is made with a breaded fish patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our special sauce.

item.name: Drwan Burger
item.description: Drawn Burger allows customers to customize their own burgers using a variety of ingredients and a interactive whiteboard. Create the perfect burger masterpiece!

item.name: Fries
item.description: Our delicious fries are made with only the freshest potatoes and fried to perfection.

item.name: Onion Rings
item.description: Our onion rings are made with fresh onions and fried to perfection.

item.name: Mozzarella Sticks
item.description: Our mozzarella sticks are made with gooey mozzarella cheese and fried to perfection.

item.name: Soft Drink
item.description: Our soft drinks are made with the freshest ingredients and are available in a variety of flavors.

item.name: milkshake
item.description: our milkshakes are hand-spun with creamy, premium ice cream.
